clock_inhibit_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC165 Clock Inhibit (CLK INH) pin. The use of it is optional, as it can be directly connected to ground.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*

clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC165 Clock (CLK) pin.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC165 Serial Output (QH) input.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this SN74HC165 component.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*

load_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC165 Load input (SH/LD) pin.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*

sr_count.docs:
**, int**: Number of daisy-chained shift registers, up-to 256. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [SN74HC165 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc165.html#configuration-variables)*
